title: Easy Prey
description: A Lucas Davenport thriller by internationally bestselling novelist John Sandford.In life she was a high-profile model. In death Alie'e Maison is the focus of a media firestorm that's demanding action from Lucas Davenport and the Minneapolis Police. Especially as one of his own men is a suspect in her murder.But when a series of bizarre, seemingly unrelated slayings rock the city, Davenport suspects a connection that runs deeper than anyone has imagined - one that leads to an ingenious killer more ruthless than anyone had feared.
author: John Sandford
